snippet: “I think there’s a growing body of intelligence and evidence that this was a bomb,” Representative Adam B. Schiff of California said on “This Week.”
abstract: Senior lawmakers in House say American intelligence officials are increasingly convinced that bomb was responsible for downing of Russian charter jet in Sina Peninsula.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Eric Schmitt from Washington; Kareem Fahim from Sharm el Sheikh, Egypt; Kimiko de Freytas-Tamura from London; and Neil MacFarquhar from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: “I think there’s a growing body of intelligence and evidence that this was a bomb,” Representative Adam B. Schiff of California said on “This Week.”

headline.main: Consensus Grows for Bomb as Cause of Russian Jet Crash, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Intelligence Consensus Grows for Bomb as Cause of Russian Crash, U.S. Officials Say

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
